trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <xref:System.EventArgs> classes which support optionally raising exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 提供的基类<xref:System.EventArgs>类有选择地引发异常的支持。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The IntegrationExceptionEventArgs class enables the user to preview an exception before it is raised.
trans-unit.target: IntegrationExceptionEventArgs 类使用户能够预览异常之前将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在事件处理程序，将的值设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>属性`true`以指示应引发的异常。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by `exception`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要引发<xref:System.Exception>指定的`exception`; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否引发<xref:System.Exception>指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the ThrowException property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在事件处理程序，将 ThrowException 属性的值设置`true`以指示应引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> will be raised; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>引发; 否则为将<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
